name: Immortal Love 2: The Price of a Miracle
name_original: Immortal Love 2: The Price of a Miracle
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

When a childhood friend offers to sell you a magical artifact, you agree to meet him to discuss a price. Something goes wrong on your way there, and though your friend Conrad comes to the rescue, you can’t help but notice that he’s not his usual self. It seems that this relic has incredible powers, and you’re not the only one who wants it! Protect it from those who would use it for evil in this hidden object adventure!

• WHAT’S THE TRUE PRICE OF A MIRACLE?
Much like those who wield it, this object has both the capacity for good and evil. Make sure you choose the right side!

• STAY ONE STEP AHEAD OF THE MYSTERIOUS BROTHERHOOD
Outwit your foes through a series of spectacular hidden object scenes.

• DON’T LET YOURSELF BECOME CORRUPTED BY THE DARK!
Use the powers of good to help you solve spectacular puzzles and mysterious mini-games.

• PLAY THIS STORY FROM ANOTHER SIDE IN THE MAGICAL BONUS CHAPTER
Continue this thrilling adventure and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Portraits, special achievements, and more!
